header.select_stream_session: Select a stream session to view

session_navigator.no_stream_sessions_message: Stream sessions will show up here when there is data.

errors.encoderNumberOfAudioChannelsError: The audio has more than two channels, but only one (mono) or two (stereo) channels are supported. Please correct the number of audio channels.
errors.encoderResolutionError: Your stream session ended because the {resolution} resolution setting is too high. Change your encoder settings to avoid the stream automatically ending.
errors.encoderKeyframeIntervalError: To achieve low latency, Amazon IVS recommends a keyframe interval of 2.
errors.encoderTargetBitrateError: Your stream session ended because the {bitrate} Mbps target bitrate setting is too high. Change your encoder settings to avoid the stream automatically ending.
errors.encoderTargetAudioBitrateError: The audio stream's target bitrate is higher than recommended. We recommend an audio stream bitrate of 320kbps or lower.

stream_events.no_stream_events_message: Stream events will show up here when there is data.

short.stream_failure: The stream is not being processed and is not available because processing capacity was exceeded.
short.starvation_start: Your stream is experiencing performance or network issues. Please check your configuration settings and network connection.
short.ingest_bitrate: Your stream session ended because the bitrate setting is too high. Please change your encoder settings.
short.ingest_resolution: Your stream session ended because the resolution setting is too high. Please change your encoder settings.
short.concurrent_broadcasts: Your stream session ended because the number of channels streaming at the same time was too high. Please change your encoder settings.
short.concurrent_viewers: Your stream session ended because the number of concurrent viewers was too high. Please change your encoder settings.
short.recording_start_failure: Recording failed to start due to errors. This live stream was not recorded.
short.recording_end_failure: Due to errors encountered during the stream, the recording was not completed successfully. Some objects may have been written to the configured storage location.

stats_card.concurrent_views_offline: Average concurrent views for the entire session

notification_with_cta.stream_instructions: To monitor stream health you must first start a live stream. Your ingest server url and stream key are found in settings.

input_error.attempt_limit_exceeded: Attempt limit exceeded, please try again later
input_error.invalid_password_strength: Use at least 1 uppercase & lowercase letter, number, and symbol
input_error.invalid_password: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of uppercase & lowercase letters, numbers & symbols
input_error.invalid_username: Only letters, numbers & symbols are allowed
input_error.same_as_old_password: Your new password cannot be the same as your old password
input_error.unexpected_error_occurred: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later

reset_stream_key_modal.confirm_intent_message: Are you sure you would like to reset your stream key?
reset_stream_key_modal.stream_will_terminate: Your current live stream will be terminated when you reset your stream key.

account_deletion_modal.confirm_intent_message: Are you sure you would like to delete your account?

password_updated_modal.confirmation_message: Your password has been updated. This change will log out your sessions on all other devices.

live_stream_ended_modal.live_stream_ended_message: The live stream you were monitoring has ended. You are now viewing the offline version.
